items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.comment: The AI assistant has revolutionized our claims processing. Response times dropped from hours to seconds, and customer satisfaction increased by 40%.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.comment: Implementing this system was seamless. Our agents now handle 3x more inquiries, and the AI accuracy is impressive.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.comment: Our customers love the instant responses. The AI understands complex insurance questions and provides accurate guidance 24/7.
